answers.answer: Well, I assume you know that diabetic people can have poor circulation in their legs, so that might be how come you are having symptoms.  I should think if you revisited your diabetes doctor, he will adjust your treatments to improve your leg issues.

question: dear sir, i am a severe diabetic patient for the 15 years.  ai am aged 48 yrs now i am suffering with neuro problem, with both my feet.  i had foot ulcer and took treatment  with the podiatriatrist.   i do not  have now foot ulcer problem.  but doctor said now my problem is because of neuro.  i do not have sense, always burning sensation, pain, unable to walk.  because of this i cannot get sleep in the nights.  kindly suggest me whether  i can continue my treatment with the podiatrist doctor or should go to neuro .  i am in hyderabad.  having two children.  girl 21 yrs and the boy is 18 yrs.  i an nuch worried whether my foot problem may suddenly attack my brain and cause death.  kindly  suggest me.  please reply..  vasumathi
title: leg problem
